Reviews.Content: near bus station metro train famous mustafa centre south asian enjoying live local foods south asian available muslims prayer hotel nice clean restaurant worth stay budget

Reviews.Title: “Budget Hotel in Little India of Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Akashbansal
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights budget hotel little india singapore strength walking distance mustafa shopping centre shopping close roadside indian restaurants budget category indian food abundantly available indian restaurant hotel location bit untidy connected singapore famous indian temple distance taxi available gate hotel easily comfortable service provide facilities fridge kettle clothing iron etc recommend hotel specially indian travelers

Reviews.Content: stay 3 nights week dec 2011 staff compared ppl trip advisor service upto mark location little india excellent worth staying hotel wanna stay little india bathroom clean neat spacious provide locker

Reviews.Title: “broadway hotel”

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights decent hotel chinese run value expensive city connectivity buses 20 feet little india fare mrt short walk excellent location beleive food shopping available close lanes alleys till late expereince

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, Terrible Attitude of Hotel”
Reviews.Author: AntOO7
Reviews.Content: hotel getting business dont care thats usual attitude front office staff deal guests rudely basic requests handled roughly theyre doing favour tone voice pitched school teacher strict school average size spacious 7th floor facing road money charge definitely value money hotels offer free wifi hotel charges ridiculous theyll sell 5 hour stop packages travel singapore stay holed hotel 5 hours sell hourly packages sell 5 hour packages attitude doesnt smart business hotel managed conservative people dont damn pleasing people attitude theyre tourists theyre anyway rip breakfast coupons s10 day indian restaurant door food lousy tearing coupons breakfast elsewhere coupon system promote restaurant serve guests hotel overall sense hotel doesnt care guests satellite tv 4 chinese channels hotel indians single english channel forget regional indian channels whats charge extra bed bed hardly walking space wont extra blanket ac installed corner wont cool shower bathroom installed keeping guests comfort mind save water water pressure low itd time bath evenings outside hotel walk prostitutes standing waiting customers nice yourre travelling family children flights morning hotel tired flight hotel doesnt lobby seats 2 guests rest stand max standing space 8 people politely theyll available 11am rudely tell waving hands youre shelter immediately feedback impact attitude basically intended warn avoid expensive service attitude stinks hotel rip price leaves bitter taste mouth spoils vacation impressions singapore people staff hotel stay hotel bad ambassador singapore singapore tourism note

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for money”
Reviews.Author: Rakesh37
Reviews.Content: surprisingly overlooking city bathrooms pretty size windows basically 2 star hotel compared paid location little india mustafa center bet cons noisy hotel road vehicles plying 24 hours carpets hotel eateries stone throw hotel ideal

Reviews.Title: “Good location; good only for sleeping in; you wouldn't want to spend time there.”
Reviews.Author: frizzy63
Reviews.Content: australia chose hotel cost factors anglo people hotel singapore expensive cheapest plus location centre western section singapore stayed 7 nights culture loved aspect observing indian people eating food atmosphere hotel grubby adequate beds comfortable clean carpet shower basically left hotel 8 morning didnt return 8 9 evenings sleep served purpose cheap shopping lots food close little india train station day tried buses werent efficient staff friendly didnt accurate information own research dont rely information cos invariably wrong nearly missed night due inaccurate information air conditioning except lack free wifi charged 5 2 hours ridiculously 1 half hour computers downstairs teenage son daughter okay hotel cheap stay location dont plan spend time simply sleep fine served

Reviews.Content: hotel situated location main road little india foot colonial district 20 mins walk reastaurant hotel food si tasty basic price satisfied max nights ideal

Reviews.Title: “Stay only if short on budget”

Reviews.Content: regret staying hotel filthy service poor hotel location located mustafa mrt station considered indian travellers otherwise breakfast included wasnt worth giving shot avoid park road nearby option youll loosen purse strings

Reviews.Title: “Decent Budget Hotel”

Reviews.Content: singapore stayed 4 nights hotel broadway hotel indians 34 minutes walk mustafa hotel middle little india 34 minutes walk bus stop front hotel delhi restraunt amber restraunt ground floor hotel provides north indian food tonnes indian food options name plus terms location hotel shade untidy carpet cleaning bathrooms reception overly helpfulthey respond cares singapore vaccation hotel spend nights shopping mustafa sighseeing day recommend budget conscious indian traveller

Reviews.Title: “Alrite considering the budget”
Reviews.Author: Riku27
Reviews.Content: location indians unfriendly staff chinese ones reception day paid extra bed foldable blankets normal beds normal blanket told extra bed netted blankets written singapore constitution lights electrical socket crt tv channels poor reception doesnt matter tho wont singapore watch tv free wifi pay pc hotel 1 30 mins cafe outside 15 hour stays 24 hrs compared budget hotels guess tho

Reviews.Title: “a little gem!”
Reviews.Author: Jan0s
Reviews.Content: clean pleasant located colourful little india district city centre broadway hotel perfect bolt hole stay singapore friendly helpful staff stay comfortable decent sized wont break bank broadway ideal budget hotel highly recommended
